title: Best Quotes of the Week: 2014 HSBC Champions
headline: Best Quotes of the Week: 2014 HSBC Champions
description: Rickie Fowler defends Cap'n Watson, G-Mac on Wee-Mac, Billy Horschel on his pants, Patrick Reed's mea culpa and what Tim Clark said after Bubba holed that bunker shot in Best Quotes of the Week.
